lines.text:
[to Lily as she watches a performance artist]
That's Peter the Performance artist as he likes to refer to it, self as show. Someday, with any luck somebody will put him out of his misery.

[during class, with the model]
Look at her, Lily. What do you see?

[a little embarrassed]
I see a face and a body.
What else?
I see a naked woman.
Right. The whole naked woman, not just parts.
[taking her hand and guiding it on the paper]
Not just the head... include the breasts and the waist... leg. The whole thing. Get it all on the page. Just keep going over and over it, eventually...

[cuts in]
Technique will give way to expression.

[straightening up]
Thank you.

[drawing aggressively]
Or expression will give way to expression.
You have some thoughts you'd like to share with us?

[looks from Donald to Lily]
Me? Thoughts? Share? Nah, I couldn't possibly. I am here to listen and learn. Copy and conform.

[about Gredin's work]
I mean from this masterpiece you've just created, it's obvious you transcended all 'need' for traditional form.
No.
[tearing off the page]
This my fellow students was created out of no other tradtion, for that of boredom.
[as classmates laugh, takes Lily's work and shows it around]
This... this is an A+. This is a perfect example of a hundred percent surrender to the process if tradtion! It's 'so' life-like, you could almost fuck it.
[more laughter as he puts the board back]

[annoyed]
Through? Can we get back to work?
[very mortified, gets up and leaves]

[under his breath, to Gredin]
Jackass.

[trying to work on her computer, as loud music is playing]
Bridget? Shut that shit off!
[hitting the wall]
Bridget!
[as Lily comes down stairs]
I'm gonna killer. You wanna help? Good! I was thinking fat pills. She always saying if she gains one more pound, sh's gonna kill herself.

[happily]
Suicide. Very good!
Thank you! Thank you very much!
[turning back to her computer]
And you know what?
What?
I got a job.
Doing what?

[taking a cookie]
Babysitting.
Well how totally sweet.

[comes in, clears his throat, and stands with his head down]
She hates me. I'm an insensitive male.

[slight confused]
You, you two know each other?

[going to his knees and taking Lily's hands]
We do, but she might not want to know me now. Tell her I'm not half bad, Tanya.

[nearly laughing]
I wish I were half as good as you, Gredin!

[pulling Lily to her feet]
Come on, I'll make it up to you.

[looking at Lily as she leaves]
Nothing ventured, nothing gained. Right?

[seeing her transformation]
Are you out of your mind? What would you do something like that?

[smoking a cigarette]
Self Expression.
Wait a minute. First you cut off all your hair, then you pierced your belly button, now you're smoking! What the hell is going on with you?

[still smoking]
Tanya, don't you have some, some sort of super highway that you need to get on? Why don't you go have some fun.

[beat]
I was just leaving... 'Guess I won't introduce you to Roxanne.
[kisses her girlfriend and leaves]

[to Lily, after finding the poems and phone call]
You know there's seems to be a whole hell of alot I don't know... What are you doing?... I wanna know, Lily!... I don't know who you are anymore. I don't know who I'm making love to anymore. If this is some kind of contest, Lily, I don't wanna compete.

[leading her up to his sculpture]
I got carried away with Donald, I shouldn't have put you in the middle of it.
Well I uh, probably over reacted. I can sometimes be hypersensitive.
[seeing his work]
You should be... You got it.
Yeah. I'm the only person in class whose hand the teacher has to hold. Literally.
Well Falk has weakness for his female undergrads, especially when they look like you.

[looking around at his sculpture]
What is this?
This is my magical craft. I'm sorta hopin' it'll win me a Gougenhiem.

[smiling]
You'll get it.
You psychic?
No. You deserve it.
So, where were you the first two weeks?
Well, when I applied I never thought I'd get accepted. I did and I freaked. No big family emergency. Just my own little private one.
[going to sit at the stone wall]
That's all.
That's enough. You see that hill over there? That's Beverly Hills, that's my home. Might as well be tim-buk-tu. My father and I, we don't talk anymore.
[watching Lily close her eyes]
What are you thinking?

[breathing deeply]
Making a wish.

[laying back]
What are you wishing?
That I could just... open my eyes and be different.
[laying back]
Listen to me.
I'm listening.
[kisses her]
and I like doing 'that'. You're beautiful.
No, I'm not.
Yes, you are. You're sweet... you're beautiful... and different.
[continues kissing her]
Hey, looking good.
[rides off]

[to Lily]
That guy's a loser. It's me you want. Besides I have alot more to offer than just my fine young body.
[pointing to his head]
I have it up here.
That's uh to bad, because all I was really interested in was your body.
[starts walkign away]

[suggestively]
Same time, same place?

[laughing]
Maybe.

[after showing off her new look]
You don't like it?

[smiling]
No. I think you look incredibly sexy.

[happy]
I'm glad you liked it.
Did Donald like it? I saw him drop you off. Seems like your becoming a regualr teachers pet.
No, just his babysitter.
[approaches him]
Do you still think I'm different? Beautiful?

[nodding]
Yeah... May I?
[before kissing her]

[catching Lily before she leaves]
Hi!
Hi! I'm really late for work.
You know you're starting to make me feel like one of those seduced and abandoned caes.
This isn't a boy, girl thing Gredin. This is work thing.

[not believing]
Are you sure?

[caresses his face]
Don't be so insecure.

[during the party after watching Lily kiss Robert]
No one's safe with you around.

[turning to dance with him]
Yeah, you got a problem with that.

[to Gredin]
I'm really sorry about the way I've been acting lately. It's just that this is a really hard transition for me and I've... been confused. But I'm not confused anymore... Please don't give up on me.

[knocking on her bedroom door]
Lily?

[as she's taking down drawings]
Yeah?
Can I come in?
No. I'm not dressed.

[through the door]
I'm sorry about earlier. It had nothing to do with you.

[to Gredin, making her last plea as he works]
I know it's pointless to ask you to forgive me... Ok, I'm just going to talk and then you won't have to deal with me anymore... My whole life, I've felt like a freak,. You know, back home in Michigan, I wasn't accepted because I was different. Then I come here and I'm not different enough... So, I decided to become someone else. Someone tough and infallible. Beautiful, sexy. Fearless. And it worked. For the first time in my life, I was accepted and I became intoxicated by the freedom of it all. Until it was too late... It's too late, isn't it?... Well for what it's worth... I love you.
[turns to leave]

[turns around, calling her]
Lily... I love you.
[picks her up and kisses her]
